name: Up We Go (GoodOlPing, JBTremblay, Saint Riversmith, Gabnixe)
name_original: Up We Go (GoodOlPing, JBTremblay, Saint Riversmith, Gabnixe)
description:
Up We Go is a 3D platformer that you can play online with up to 8 players.

Grab and roll your way through the level to reach the giant tree.

This game was made as a school project

Controls:

  • Arm Movement - Left Stick / WASD
  • Camera Movement - Right Stick / Mouse Movement
  • Left Grab - LT / Left Click
  • Right Grab - RT / Right Click
  • Ball Mode - A / Space
  • Pause - Start / Escape

Made By Brain Dead:

  • Nicolas Bisson : https://nicolasbisson.com/
  • Jérémy Laforge-Riverin : https://saint-riversmith.itch.io/
  • Antony Ménard
  • Gabriel St-Laurent-Recoura : https://gabnixe.itch.io/
  • Philippe Therrien
  • Jean-Benoît Tremblay

With Support From:

  • Kevin Bouchard

  • Ultimate Polygon Hat Bundle (EpiXR Games)
